docs.snippet: You look out at the landscape, and there have to be moments when you just say, where to begin? How to start? But there's no doubt in my mind what the people of this community can do. There's no doubt in my mind that Joplin will rebuild.     PRESID...
docs.lead_paragraph: You look out at the landscape, and there have to be moments when you just say, where to begin? How to start? But there's no doubt in my mind what the people of this community can do. There's no doubt in my mind that Joplin will rebuild. PRESIDENT OBAMA [A13]

docs.snippet: I am not the first president to take up this cause, but I am determined to be the last.     PRESIDENT OBAMA,  speaking on health care  before Congress. [A1]...

docs.snippet: ''I  want the American people to know that the use of force is not our first  choice, and it's not a choice that I make lightly. But we can't stand  idly by when a tyrant tells his people that there will be no mercy.''  PRESIDENT OBAMA, on the Ame...
docs.lead_paragraph: ''I want the American people to know that the use of force is not our first choice, and it's not a choice that I make lightly. But we can't stand idly by when a tyrant tells his people that there will be no mercy.'' PRESIDENT OBAMA, on the American decision to use military force against Col. Muammar el-Qaddafi of Libya.

docs.snippet: If this tragedy prompts reflection and debate, as it should, let's make sure it's worthy of those we have lost. PRESIDENT OBAMA,  speaking at a memorial service for the victims of the Tucson shooting rampage. [A1]...

docs.snippet: Just saying no to everything may be good short-term politics, but it's not leadership. We were sent here to serve our  citizens, not our ambitions.     PRESIDENT OBAMA....
docs.lead_paragraph: Just saying no to everything may be good short-term politics, but it's not leadership. We were sent here to serve our citizens, not our ambitions. PRESIDENT OBAMA.

docs.snippet: Bankers don't need another vote in the United States Senate. They've got plenty.     PRESIDENT OBAMA, at a campaign rally in Massachusetts for Martha Coakley, who is running for the Senate against a conservative Republican, Scott Brown. [A13]...
